attributes.title: Worst app made my phone glitch and it doesn’t even work when I open it it closed automatically
attributes.review: Worst app made my phone glitch and it doesn’t even work when I open it it closed automatically

attributes.title: BURNT MY PHONE TO A CRISP
attributes.review: i had to get a new phone i wanted to show my support for my little Cheeto man but unfortunately after downloading my phone had serious glitches. i don’t think i can support someone that gives out fake news like this to his supporters. trump 2020 😻🐯🦋 on a gravestone ⚡️🥰🌈

attributes.title: Worst app ever!
attributes.review: I wanted to see the stupid app my orange racist president wrote and even then it was a lie and I saw an ugly af photo of him which made me hurl the realize what and even uglier stupid bastard.. then I also remembered all the racist comments he made about Mexicans and African American and the WALL this was the most time I’ve ever wasted in my life. BYE mr. ugly orange

attributes.title: absolute garbage
attributes.review: this stupid app took months to download and sucked my battery dry whilst doing so. i couldn’t leave my home on account of my phone dying as soon as i took it off the charger. i didn’t shower for months. i smell like weed and rotten onions. i didn’t feed my cat and she moved out. i miss her. this stupid app costed me my cat and my ability to function like a normal human. my neighbors are genuinely worried about me. i’m not voting trump in the next election. he can’t make an app work so i don’t trust him to run a country. 😓

attributes.title: Very disappointed
attributes.review: This app took 2 weeks to download and my my whole phone glitch after is was downloaded. I just wanted to show my support and the app was so bad I’m no longer a support. It showed tons or inappropriate things towards young girls supporters. High disturbed

attributes.title: bad app
attributes.review: this app is the most glitchy thing I’ve ever seen! I’ve had it downloaded for a few days now, and I can hardly even open it without my phone crashing. when it does open, it just blares shane dawson singing! horrible app

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Awful awful awful. Glitches out EVERYTIME I opened it and played a very loud screech as well. Uninstalled it and tried again and did the same thing and it wouldn’t stop at one point to where I had to restart my entire phone. So yeah, AWFUL

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: It is by far the worst app I ever downloaded. So many glitches and even took up so much space on my phone and drained my battery. I would’ve given it a zero but had to rate it in order to write my review. It was a horrendous experience.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: this app took weeks to download and when I opened it, it glitched and broke my phone!!! All of my contacts, pictures and apps are trashed now and I have no way of retrieving them! The app took my credit card information and social security number. This is the WORST APP EVER!!!

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: this app is terrible >:( not only did it take forever to load but it kept crashing after i tried to open it. I only wanted to see the news about my dear presidents campaign but it seems this app is simply not worth the time. DO NOT RECCOMEND
